entries.name: rdoc(req, res)
entries.desc: Can be used for quick navigation to the rdoc documentation.  You can then define a search shortcut for your browser.  E.g. in Firefox connect 'shortcut:rdoc' to localhost:8808/rdoc?q=%s template. Then you can directly open the ActionPack documentation by typing 'rdoc actionp'. If there are multiple hits for the search term, they are presented as a list with links.

entries.name: show_rdoc_for_pattern(pattern, res)
entries.desc: Returns true and prepares http response, if rdoc for the requested gem name pattern was found.
